## Bio

I am from Benin, a western African country. I am currently doing a Ph.D. at Jeonbuk National University in the Republic of South Korea. I am working in plant genomics domain with a focus on high-quality genome construction of both wild and cultivated sesame. My work is highly dominated by bioinformatics. I love playing with the programming languages such as perl, java with a great interest in R.
